ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] It's too quiet for a bunch of musicians
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, NK and EK aren t bad - but anywhere at your level will be kind of rough.  I spent several levels (11 up to 16) in Unrest, m self, but that s
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:56 PM 11/29/2001 +0000, you wrote:
>So, what, I join the list and you all get quiet? I'm only 11, my
>reputation cannot have preceded me as yet. I've been soloing in NK
>since 9, my first bard. Any words of wisdom on where to go next?


Actually, NK and EK aren't bad - but anywhere at your level will be kind of
rough. I spent several levels (11 up to 16) in Unrest, m'self, but that's
certainly NOT for the weak of heart ;) Lots of trains.

As for the quiet, I imagine everyone's girding for the SoL release.

BTW, has anyone noticed the SoL skill list for Bards? Lots of nice things,
but when do those skills kick in???

Talies the Wanderer
